code: import*as ActionTypes from'./ActionTypes';import{backendUrl}from'../shared/urls';import{wpGetFeaturedImage}from'../shared/wpGetFeaturedImage';function imagePreFetcher(arr,desc){setTimeout(function(){console.log('imagePreFetcher',desc);arr.forEach(function(post){new Image().src=wpGetFeaturedImage(post);});},10000*Math.random());}/* '+response.statusText);error.response=response;throw error;}},function(error){var errmess=new Error(error.message);throw errmess;}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(specialties){return dispatch(addSpecialties(specialties));}).then(function(specialties){return imagePreFetcher(specialties.payload,"Specialities");}).catch(function(error){return dispatch(specialtiesFailed(error.message));});};};export var specialtiesLoading=function
